ISSUE.TITLE: 500 Error when logging out
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: 500 Error when trying to log out of gpodder.net See sentry Error https://sentry.io/organizations/skoegl/issues/2028765410/?project=1778079 fix: as per https://stackoverflow.com/questions/63394004/client-object-has-no-attribute-deletetouch-in-django-admin-logout-section, we may need to update memecached client.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #583 from gpodder/dependabot/pip/responses-0.13.3 Bump responses from 0.12.1 to 0.13.3
